[Municipal Court](https://merkeltexas.com/municipal-court/ "Permalink to Municipal Court")
==========================================================================================

**MERKEL MUNICIPAL COURT**

CITY OF MERKEL  
100 KENT ST.  
MERKEL, TX 79536  
Office: (325) 928-4911  
Fax: (325) 928-3171

**Municipal Judge – Kim Baggett**

**Municipal Court Clerk – Elizabeth Dosser**

EM: elizabeth.dosser@merkeltx.gov

The Merkel Municipal Court is located at 100 Kent Street, Merkel, TX. Normal business hours are 7:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., closed from 12:00 p.m. to 1:00 p.m. for lunch. When making a personal appearance you must enter City Hall through the Water Department entrance. From there, you will be directed to the Court.

**Please allow two (2) working days for Court personnel to process your citation.**

**Entering a Plea:**

After receiving a citation, you must appear in Court and enter a plea by the twenty (20) day promise to appear date. You may appear in person, through certified mail or via attorney. You will need to enter a plea to each charge.

**The available pleas are:**

1. Nolo Contendere (No Contest);
2. Guilty; or
3. Not Guilty.

With a plea of No Contest or Guilty, you have the option of requesting a Driver’s Safety Course (DSC) or requesting Deferred Disposition. You **MUST** contact the Court. It is not guaranteed that the DSC or deferral request will be granted.

**You are not eligible for the DSC option if:**

* Your offense occurred in a construction zone with workers present.
* You were passing a school bus.
* You were speeding 25 MPH or more above the posted speed limit.
* Your speed was 95 MPH or more.
* You hold a commercial driver’s license (CDL).

If you choose to make a plea of Not Guilty, you will be set for a pre-trial hearing and notice will be mailed to you via certified mail.

If you have any questions, please refer to the Municipal Court Procedures form or contact the Court.
